IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: WBC IS A CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION DEDICATED TO FOSTERING THE WELL BEING OF UNDERSERVED AND AT-RISK CHILDREN IN LOS ANGELES THROUGH ITS MEMBERS' COMMITMENT OF THEIR TIME AND FINANCIAL RESOURCES. THE WBC DIRECTLY IMPACTS SMALLER CHARITIES BY PROVIDING GRANTS, HOSTING EVENTS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: WBC IS A CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION DEDICATED TO FOSTERING THE WELL BEING OF UNDERSERVED AND AT-RISK CHILDREN IN LOS ANGELES THROUGH ITS MEMBERS' COMMITMENT OF THEIR TIME AND FINANCIAL RESOURCES. THE WBC DIRECTLY IMPACTS SMALLER CHARITIES BY PROVIDING GRANTS, HOSTING EVENTS.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDE GRANTS TO SMALLER 501(C)3 ORGANIZATIONS IN THE COUNTY OF LOS ANGELES. THESE GRANTS ARE TARGETED FOR THE PURCHASE OF CAPITAL ITEMS THAT HAVE A REPETITIVE AND USEFUL LIFE OVER MULTIPLE YEARS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: ANNUAL THANKSGIVING BASKET DINNER GIVE-AWAY, WHERE THE WBC DISTRIBUTES MEALS TO HUNDREDS OF NEEDY FAMILIES IN LOS ANGELES. EACH BASKET FEEDS UP TO 10 PEOPLE, PROVIDING THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE A HOLIDAY MEAL.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: HOSTING FIELD TRIPS FOR KIDS IN LOS ANGELES: ANNUAL PILGRIMAGES TO THESANTA MONICA PIER FOR OUR "CHRISTMAS IN MAY" EVENT, THE WBC'S "REACHFOR THE STARS" AT THE GRIFFITH OBSERVATORY, A HOLIDAY MOVIE SCREENINGIN DECEMBER, AND TRIPS TO DODGERS, LAKERS AND CLIPPERS GAMES THROUGHOUTTHE YEAR.

IRS990ScheduleG.ExplanationIfNoTxt: ORGANIZATION HOSTS AN ANNUAL POKER TOURNAMENT WHERE NET PROCEEDS GO TOWARDS THE EXEMPT FUNCTION OF PROVIDING SUPPORT TO UNDERSERVED KIDS AND CHILDREN'S 501(C)3 ORGANIZATIONS IN LOS ANGELES THAT OFTEN FALL UNDER THE RADAR OF TRADITIONAL GIVING.
